clinical_history: Patient presents with cough and fever.
findings: Enlarged lymph nodes in right middle lobe, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in right middle lobe.
Small pneumothorax on the right middle lobe side.
Bronchiectatic changes in right middle lobe region.
Collapse of right middle lobe lobe with volume loss.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of right middle lobe.
recommendations: Further evaluation with PET-CT recommended if malignancy suspected.
